name: Spell Book
overview: Your child will learn to spell the fun way with this highly addictive spelling aid with a game like atmosphere to make spelling practice that bit more enjoyable. The program uses phonics to teach children letter and word recognition, that is to say all words used sound as they spell. A picture of the word to spell appears on the screen and the child then has to spell the word by clicking with the mouse on the alphabet displayed. Correct spelling is rewarded by a pleasant tune and a congratulations message.
